prompt:
A boldly seductive Korean woman in her 20s standing alone under a bus stop shelter at night rain, cinematic
intimate mood, framed from mid-torso to mid-thigh.
Pose: one hand gripping the vertical pole above shoulder height (stretch tension), hips angled forward, spine
subtly arched; the other hand holds her coat lapel close to the collarbone as if bracing against the cold wind.
Expression: unwavering direct eye contact, slightly narrowed half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile, slow-
breath intensity (confident and commanding).
Outfit: matte fitted cotton jersey top + high-waist skirt or tailored shorts tasteful under a textured wool coat.
The top and skirt are rain-soaked and cling realistically with visible wet fabric tension, darker wet patches,
micro-wrinkles, and natural stretch lines (wet cling effect without nudity). A few damp hair strands stick to her
cheek/neck; subtle water droplets on fabric and skin.
Lighting: cool streetlight ambient + warm shop/window spill in the distance (mixed lighting), wet asphalt
reflections, mild halation around streetlights, smooth highlight roll-off, no clipped highlights; soft shadow
gradients.
Environment: rain streaks, puddle reflections, empty street background, shallow depth of field; bus stop glass
with raindrops; no readable signage or ads.
Camera: 85mm, f/1.8, handheld candid documentary snapshot, shallow DOF, slight natural motion realism.
Film look: Kodak Portra 400, subtle grain, gentle vignette, smooth tonal transitions; no HDR, no hyper-clarity, no
over-sharpening, no CGI look.
Realistic skin texture with visible pores and subtle imperfections; avoid perfect symmetry; natural makeup, thin
base, muted lip.
Exclude any readable text, signage, logos, posters, labels, watermarks; tasteful, non-explicit, no nudity, no
pornographic framing.
